output:
I know there's no use getting angry I know there's no use being sad
I'm much too tired to lose my temper on you These small mercies make me glad
Escape into another world if it isn't here There's no joy and yet no pain
But who's that man? I heard myself talking Lines on my face like rain on filthy windows
But who's that man? I heard myself talking Lines on my face like rain on filthy windows
Spent all my money playing card games No one taught me how to lose
That's not to say I won So with the damage done I guess the opposite is true
Who might save me from this boy?
But who's that man? I heard myself talking Lines on my face like rain on filthy windows
I know it's time for a decision If there is any point at all
The drugs take care of my ambition A part of me must take a fall
This must be my last half hour, yeah
Instrumental
Sledge my name on your desk with the fountain pen This means I'll be on, yeah
Sledge my name on your desk with the fountain pen This means I'll be on, yeah
Outro
